issue.title: [Plasma] PlasmaClient uses global variable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2458](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2458). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The threadpool threadpool_ that PlasmaClient is using is global at the moment. This prevents us from using multiple PlasmaClients in the same process (one per thread).
